patents.title: AI Drug Discovery Platform
patents.description: AI system that identifies promising drug compounds 10x faster than traditional methods. Already discovered 3 compounds now in clinical trials, with 2 showing breakthrough therapy designation potential.

Inventor.name: Dr. Adriana Martinez
Inventor.bio:
Harvard Medical | Former Pfizer
15 peer-reviewed papers

patents.title: Quantum Computing Security Protocol
patents.description: Post-quantum cryptography solution that protects data against quantum attacks. Already deployed in 2 Fortune 500 companies with 99.99% uptime and zero security breaches.

Inventor.name: Dr. Michael Chen
Inventor.bio:
MIT CSAIL | Former Google
20+ patents filed
